oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Group of six Confederate buttons
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Six Confederate buttons consisting of "Southrons" button (Miss. Unit), Mississippi "I" button, Confederate Block "I" button of Richmond manufacture, Confederate staff officer button, Kentucky State seal button, and a Confederate droop wing staff officer button. The Southrons became Co. A, 21st Mississippi Inf. Regt., CSA. The "I" which appears on two of the buttons stands for infantry.
